QuestData.Title: Enemy at the Gates
QuestData.Description: The mantid forces are pouring against the wall. I've arranged for some flying serpents to cut away at their forces from the air.$B$BWould you be willing to take the reigns on one of them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Shado-Pan Sky Serpent to kill 60 Krik'thik attackers, 3 Krik'thik War Wagons, and 3 Krik'thik Catapults.
